## Introduction

This is a sample R Markdown document for testing the CLI scanner.

## Data Analysis

```{r data}
# Create sample data
data <- mtcars %>%
  select(mpg, cyl, hp, wt) %>%
  head(10)

knitr::kable(data)
```

## Visualization

```{r plot}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = factor(cyl))) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "MPG vs Weight", color = "Cylinders")
```

## Summary

This document demonstrates the scanner's ability to detect `.Rmd` files.
